package.name: @choice-ui/description
package.description: A description component for form fields and UI elements with proper accessibility support

stories.name: Basic
stories.description:
Basic description usage.

Use the `Description` component to provide supplementary text for form fields.

stories.name: Disabled
stories.description:
Disabled description.

Use the `disabled` prop to match the disabled state of form fields.
stories.source:
import { Description } from "@choice-ui/description" export default function App() { return (
This field is currently disabled.
); }

stories.name: Multiple Descriptions
stories.description:
Multiple descriptions.

You can use multiple descriptions to provide different types of information.
stories.source:
import { Description } from "@choice-ui/description" export default function App() { return (
Choose a strong password. Must be at least 8 characters with one uppercase letter.
); }
